            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Maritime Aboriginal Peoples Council as a regional Aboriginal Peoples Advocacy Group, has the expertise and capacity to undertake a range of “pilot or regional” programs or initiatives. One of these projects is the In-Situ Egg Incubation Project, which aims at understanding survivability of the endangered inner Bay of Fundy Atlantic salmon in hopes of recovery. Potential sites for the planting of the fertilized eggs were monitored extensively, including water quality parameters and the fluvial dynamics.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-634j-px31
notes: The Maritime Aboriginal Peoples Council as a regional Aboriginal Peoples Advocacy Group, has the expertise and capacity to undertake a range of “pilot or regional” programs or initiatives. One of these projects is the In-Situ Egg Incubation Project, which aims at understanding survivability of the endangered inner Bay of Fundy Atlantic salmon in hopes of recovery. Potential sites for the planting of the fertilized eggs were monitored extensively, including water quality parameters and the fluvial dynamics.

notes_translated.en: The Maritime Aboriginal Peoples Council as a regional Aboriginal Peoples Advocacy Group, has the expertise and capacity to undertake a range of “pilot or regional” programs or initiatives. One of these projects is the In-Situ Egg Incubation Project, which aims at understanding survivability of the endangered inner Bay of Fundy Atlantic salmon in hopes of recovery. Potential sites for the planting of the fertilized eggs were monitored extensively, including water quality parameters and the fluvial dynamics.
notes_translated.fr: Le Conseil des peuples autochtones des Maritimes, en tant que groupe régional de défense des droits des peuples autochtones, possède l'expertise et la capacité nécessaires pour entreprendre une gamme de programmes ou d'initiatives « pilotes ou régionaux ». L'un de ces projets est le projet d'incubation d'œufs in situ, qui vise à comprendre la capacité de survie du saumon atlantique de l'intérieur de la baie de Fundy, une espèce en voie de disparition, dans l'espoir de se rétablir. Les sites potentiels pour la plantation des œufs fécondés ont fait l'objet d'une surveillance approfondie, notamment en ce qui concerne les paramètres de qualité de l'eau et la dynamique fluviale.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: In-Situ Egg Incubation Project
